Painter method Judging the survival status of the home and whether it is red • If the home is alive and red, draw a red square picture and set the blood lineHome.DrawBloodbBar.draw(Graphics) If the home is alive and blue, draw a blue crystal picture and set the blood lineHome.DrawBloodbBar.draw(Graphics) If the home is not alive and is red, draw the "Victory" font and call the Home.gameOver(Graphics) function.
